feed.title: A log of a refactoring process - Python

entry.title: Declaration of Intension
entry.content:
Declaration of Intension

This blog is part of my refactorting process. I should have been incorporated since the begining and that is a greivious mistake, that has mad this journey a painful one. No w I am about to address.

I will be blogging daily on Gotchas I face or blast from the past. I will have weekly indept blog on specific topics, tools, etc and compare how Java (my current focus) addresses the topic with other languages.

I will avoid soft topics - non technical, phylosophical issues, that is what Medium is good for IMHO.

This will definately be updated later
